text: The Miracle of Manhattan is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog: The Miracle of Manhattan 1921 American silent melodrama film directed by George Archainbaud and starring Elaine Hammerstein and Matt Moore. It was produced by Lewis J. Selznick(of Selznick Pictures) and released through Select Pictures.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films: The Miracle of Manhattan ==Cast== *Elaine Hammerstein as Mary Malone/Evelyn Whitney *Matt Moore as Larry Marshall *Ellen Cassidy as Stella Warren (credited as Ellen Cassity) *Nora Reed as An Intruder *Walter Greene as Tony the Dude *Leonora von Ottinger as Mrs. Peabody (credited as Leonora Ottinger) *John Raymond as Robert Van Cleek (credited as Jack Raymond) ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1921 films Category:American silent feature films Category:Lost American films Category:Films directed by George Archainbaud Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American drama films Category:1921 drama films Category:Melodramas Category:Selznick Pictures films
title: The Miracle of Manhattan
